protein.specific_function: Component of intercellular desmosome junctions. Involved in the interaction of plaque proteins and intermediate filaments mediating cell-cell adhesion

reference.reference_text: Schafer S, Koch PJ, Franke WW: Identification of the ubiquitous human desmoglein, Dsg2, and the expression catalogue of the desmoglein subfamily of desmosomal cadherins. Exp Cell Res. 1994 Apr;211(2):391-9.
